jobDescription: Work on development, customization, support, maintenance, or QA&Testing of software applications, web portals, intranet, website, and mobile applications. Participate in requirement gathering, preparing technical specifications, system design, architecting software systems, writing business cases and test scenarios, and system testing. Participate in the SDLC, recommend new technology solutions, and potentially manage IT projects.
preferredQualifications: Successfully executed projects on .NET or JAVA and web development platforms beyond college curriculum

Basic knowledge in combination of development technologies: Microsoft .NET, JAVA, Angular Java, PHP, C-Sharp, HTML 5, CSS, JavaScript, XML; MS-SQL Server / Oracle / MySQL, MSIIS / Apache server / PLSQL etc
